# å®Ÿç”¨IPè¨ˆç®—å¼ï¼ˆç½å®³ã‚’é¿ã‘ã‚‹ï¼‰
IP_Calculation_Formula:
  Base_Requirements:
    Services: N
    Pods_Per_Service: P
    Environments: E (prod/staging/dev/canary)
    
  Service_Mesh_Factor: 2.0  # Istio proxyåˆ†
  Database_Factor: 1.5      # DB replicaåˆ†  
  Monitoring_Factor: 1.2    # Monitoring stack
  Auto_Scaling_Factor: 3.0  # Burst scaling
  Safety_Buffer: 2.0        # ä½™è£•ã‚’æŒã£ãŸè¨­è¨ˆ
  
  Total_IPs = N Ã— P Ã— E Ã— 2.0 Ã— 1.5 Ã— 1.2 Ã— 3.0 Ã— 2.0
  
Example:
  200 services Ã— 3 pods Ã— 4 envs Ã— 2.0 Ã— 1.5 Ã— 1.2 Ã— 3.0 Ã— 2.0 
  = 200 Ã— 3 Ã— 4 Ã— 21.6 = 51,840 IPs required
  
Recommended_CIDR: /14 (65,536 IPs) ä»¥ä¸Š

apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
kind: PrometheusRule
spec:
  groups:
  - name: subnet-monitoring
    rules:
    - alert: SubnetIPUtilizationHigh
      expr: subnet_ip_utilization > 0.8
      labels:
        severity: warning
      annotations:
        summary: "Subnet IP utilization above 80%"
        
    - alert: SubnetIPUtilizationCritical  
      expr: subnet_ip_utilization > 0.95
      labels:
        severity: critical
      annotations:
        summary: "URGENT: Subnet running out of IPs"

def select_ip_range(total_sites, total_subnets, total_hosts):
    """
    è¦ä»¶ã«åŸºã¥ãæœ€é©IPã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹å¸¯ã®é¸æŠ
    """
    if total_hosts > 1_000_000:
        return "10.0.0.0/8"  # å¤§ä¼æ¥­ãƒ»å¤šæ‹ ç‚¹
    elif total_hosts > 50_000:
        return "172.16.0.0/12"  # ä¸­ä¼æ¥­
    else:
        return "192.168.0.0/16"  # å°ä¼æ¥­
        
# ä½¿ç”¨ä¾‹
recommendation = select_ip_range(
    total_sites=5,
    total_subnets=20, 
    total_hosts=500
)
print(f"æ¨å¥¨: {recommendation}")  # æ¨å¥¨: 172.16.0.0/12

ZeroTrust_IAM:

    - Continuous authentication & authorization
    - Least privilege access
    - Multi-factor authentication mandatory

      - Device compliance checking
      - Location-based risk assessment
      - Behavior analytics for anomaly detection

# ã‚»ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ç›£è¦–ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ 
class SecurityMonitor:
    def __init__(self):
        self.threat_detection = ThreatDetectionEngine()
        self.behavior_analytics = BehaviorAnalytics()
        self.incident_response = IncidentResponseSystem()
    
    def monitor_network_traffic(self):
        """ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ç›£è¦–"""
        while True:
            traffic = self.capture_traffic()
            
            # ç•°å¸¸æ¤œçŸ¥
            if self.threat_detection.is_suspicious(traffic):
                alert = self.generate_alert(traffic)
                self.incident_response.handle(alert)
            
            # è¡Œå‹•åˆ†æ
            user_behavior = self.behavior_analytics.analyze(traffic)
            if user_behavior.risk_score > 0.8:
                self.enforce_additional_auth(user_behavior.user_id)
    
    def enforce_additional_auth(self, user_id):
        """ãƒªã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹è¿½åŠ èªè¨¼"""
        self.iam_service.require_mfa(user_id)
        self.iam_service.reduce_privileges(user_id, duration=3600)

# application-deployment.yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: secure-webapp
spec:
  replicas: 3
  template:
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: webapp-sa
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
        fsGroup: 2000
      containers:
      - name: webapp
        image: secure-webapp:v2.0
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        env:
        - name: DB_CONNECTION
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: db-credentials
              key: connection-string

# After: ã‚»ã‚­ãƒ¥ã‚¢ãªå®Ÿè£…
def get_user_data(user_id: int, current_user: User) -> Optional[UserData]:
    # èªè¨¼ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
    if not current_user.is_authenticated():
        raise UnauthorizedException("User not authenticated")
    
    # èªå¯ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
    if not current_user.can_access_user(user_id):
        raise ForbiddenException("Access denied")
    
    # SQLã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å¯¾ç­–
    query = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = %s"
    result = database.execute_safe(query, (user_id,))
    
    # ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ³ã‚°
    return self.mask_sensitive_data(result, current_user.role)

// user_service.proto v1.1.0
syntax = "proto3";

package userservice.v1;

service UserService {
  rpc CreateUser(CreateUserRequest) returns (CreateUserResponse);
  
  // éæ¨å¥¨ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯: GetUserDetails ã«ç§»è¡Œã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„
  rpc GetUserInfo(GetUserInfoRequest) returns (GetUserInfoResponse) {

  }
  
  // æ–°ã—ã„API: æ”¹å–„ã•ã‚ŒãŸæ©Ÿèƒ½
  rpc GetUserDetails(GetUserDetailsRequest) returns (GetUserDetailsResponse);

  // æ–°API: ã‚ˆã‚ŠæŸ”è»Ÿãªãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼æ›´æ–°
  rpc UpdateUserProfile(UpdateUserProfileRequest) returns (UpdateUserProfileResponse);
}

  string name = 1;
  string email = 2;
  int32 age = 3;  // éæ¨å¥¨: birth_date ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„
  
  // æ–°ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰è¿½åŠ 
  string birth_date = 4;  // YYYY-MM-DDå½¢å¼
}

// éæ¨å¥¨ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸
message GetUserInfoRequest {
  option deprecated = true;
  string user_id = 1;
}

  option deprecated = true;
  User user = 1;
  string legacy_format = 2;  // éæ¨å¥¨
}

// æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸
message GetUserDetailsRequest {
  string user_id = 1;
  // è¿½åŠ ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
  bool include_profile = 2;
  bool include_preferences = 3;
}

message GetUserDetailsResponse {
  UserDetails user = 1;
}

message UserDetails {
  string id = 1;
  string name = 2;
  string email = 3;
  string birth_date = 4;
  UserProfile profile = 5;
  UserPreferences preferences = 6;
}

message UserProfile {
  string department = 1;
  string title = 2;
  string location = 3;
}

message UserPreferences {
  string language = 1;
  string timezone = 2;
  bool email_notifications = 3;
}

syntax = "proto3";

package userservice.v1;

service UserService {

  // éæ¨å¥¨API - å‰Šé™¤äºˆå®šæ—¥: 2024-12-31
  rpc GetUserInfo(GetUserInfoRequest) returns (GetUserInfoResponse) {
    option deprecated = true;

  }
  
  rpc GetUserDetails(GetUserDetailsRequest) returns (GetUserDetailsResponse);

  // ã•ã‚‰ãªã‚‹æ”¹å–„APIè¿½åŠ

package userservice.v2;  // ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚‚æ›´æ–°

service UserService {
  rpc CreateUser(CreateUserRequest) returns (CreateUserResponse);
  
  // GetUserInfo ã¯å®Œå…¨å‰Šé™¤
  // rpc GetUserInfo ã¯å‰Šé™¤æ¸ˆã¿
  
  rpc GetUserDetails(GetUserDetailsRequest) returns (GetUserDetailsResponse);
  rpc UpdateUser(UpdateUserRequest) returns (UpdateUserResponse);
  rpc UpdateUserProfile(UpdateUserProfileRequest) returns (UpdateUserProfileResponse);
  rpc BatchGetUsers(BatchGetUsersRequest) returns (BatchGetUsersResponse);
  
  // æ–°æ©Ÿèƒ½è¿½åŠ 
  rpc SearchUsers(SearchUsersRequest) returns (SearchUsersResponse);
}

message CreateUserRequest {
  string name = 1;
  string email = 2;
  
  // age ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã¯å®Œå…¨å‰Šé™¤ã€ç•ªå·ã¯äºˆç´„æ¸ˆã¿
  reserved 3;

  string birth_date = 4;  // å¿…é ˆãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã«å¤‰æ›´
}

// å‰Šé™¤ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ç•ªå·ã‚’äºˆç´„ã—ã¦å†åˆ©ç”¨ã‚’é˜²ã
reserved 100 to 110;  // å‰Šé™¤ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ç•ªå·ç¯„å›²
reserved "GetUserInfoRequest", "GetUserInfoResponse";

  reserved 4, 5;  // æ—§ age, department
  reserved "age", "department";
  
  string id = 1;
  string name = 2;
  string email = 3;
  string birth_date = 6;
  
  // æ–°ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰è¿½åŠ å¯èƒ½
  string phone_number = 7;
}

message UserDetails {
  string id = 1;
  string name = 2;
  string email = 3;
  string birth_date = 4;
  UserProfile profile = 5;
  UserPreferences preferences = 6;
  
  // v2.0.0 ã§æ–°æ©Ÿèƒ½è¿½åŠ 
  repeated string tags = 7;
  int64 created_at = 8;
  int64 updated_at = 9;
}

message SearchUsersRequest {
  string query = 1;
  int32 limit = 2;
  string page_token = 3;
  UserSearchFilter filter = 4;
}

message SearchUsersResponse {
  repeated UserDetails users = 1;
  string next_page_token = 2;
  int32 total_count = 3;
}

message UserSearchFilter {
  string department = 1;
  string location = 2;
  bool active_only = 3;
}

func (s *UserService) GetUserInfo(ctx context.Context, req *pb.GetUserInfoRequest) (*pb.GetUserInfoResponse, error) {
    // éæ¨å¥¨APIä½¿ç”¨æ™‚ã®è­¦å‘Šãƒ­ã‚°

             "client", getClientFromContext(ctx))
    
    // ãƒ¡ãƒˆãƒªã‚¯ã‚¹åé›†

    // å†…éƒ¨çš„ã«æ–°APIã«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰

}

class UserServiceClient:
    def __init__(self, stub):
        self.stub = stub
        self._use_new_api = self._check_server_version()
    
    def get_user(self, user_id: str) -> User:
        if self._use_new_api:
            # æ–°APIä½¿ç”¨
            request = GetUserDetailsRequest(
                user_id=user_id,
                include_profile=True
            )
            response = self.stub.GetUserDetails(request)
            return self._convert_user_details(response.user)
        else:
            # æ—§APIã‚’ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯
            request = GetUserInfoRequest(user_id=user_id)
            response = self.stub.GetUserInfo(request)
            return response.user
    
    def _check_server_version(self) -> bool:
        # ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ç¢ºèªã—ã¦æ–°APIã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’åˆ¤å®š
        try:
            # ãƒ˜ãƒ«ã‚¹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚„ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³APIã§ç¢ºèª
            return True
        except:
            return False

#!/bin/bash
# setup-secure-proxy.sh

set -euo pipefail

# è¨¼æ˜æ›¸ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¨è¨­å®š
echo "Setting up secure proxy certificates..."

# GCS ã‹ã‚‰è¨¼æ˜æ›¸ã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰

# ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ã«è¨¼æ˜æ›¸ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
sudo cp /tmp/inspection-ca.crt /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/company-inspection-ca.crt
sudo update-ca-certificates

# Gitè¨­å®š
git config --global http.sslCAInfo /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/company-inspection-ca.crt

# Python/pipè¨­å®š
pip config set global.cert /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/company-inspection-ca.crt

# Node.js/npmè¨­å®š  
npm config set cafile /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/company-inspection-ca.crt

echo "Setup completed successfully!"

resource "google_workstations_workstation_config" "main" {
  workstation_config_id = "${var.prefix}-config"
  location              = var.region
  workstation_cluster_id = google_workstations_workstation_cluster.main.workstation_cluster_id

  container {
    image = "us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/cloud-workstations-images/predefined/code-oss:latest"
    
    # èµ·å‹•æ™‚ã«è¨¼æ˜æ›¸è¨­å®šã‚’è‡ªå‹•å®Ÿè¡Œ
    run_as_user = 1000
    working_dir = "/home/user"
    
    env = {
      "SETUP_SCRIPT_URL" = "gs://company-scripts/setup-secure-proxy.sh"
    }
  }

  # èµ·å‹•æ™‚ã«è‡ªå‹•å®Ÿè¡Œ
  persistent_directories {
    mount_path = "/home/user"
    gce_pd {
      size_gb = 100
    }
  }
}

# æœ€çµ‚çš„ãªè§£æ±ºç­–
resource "google_network_security_gateway_security_policy_rule" "allow_approved_repos" {
  name                    = "allow-approved-repos"
  location               = var.region
  gateway_security_policy = google_network_security_gateway_security_policy.main.name
  priority               = 100
  enabled                = true
  
  # æ‰¿èªã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒªãƒã‚¸ãƒˆãƒªã®ã¿è¨±å¯ï¼ˆæ­£è¦è¡¨ç¾ä½¿ç”¨ï¼‰
  session_matcher = <<-EOF
    host() == 'github.com' && 
    (inUrlPath('/mycompany/project-backend') ||
     inUrlPath('/mycompany/project-frontend') ||
     inUrlPath('/mycompany/shared-utils') ||
     inUrlPath('/mycompany/infrastructure'))
  EOF
  
  basic_profile = "ALLOW"
}

# GitHub API ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ç”¨
resource "google_network_security_gateway_security_policy_rule" "allow_github_api" {
  name                    = "allow-github-api"
  location               = var.region
  gateway_security_policy = google_network_security_gateway_security_policy.main.name
  priority               = 101
  enabled                = true
  
  session_matcher = <<-EOF
    host() == 'api.github.com' && 
    (inUrlPath('/repos/mycompany/project-backend') ||
     inUrlPath('/repos/mycompany/project-frontend') ||
     inUrlPath('/repos/mycompany/shared-utils') ||
     inUrlPath('/repos/mycompany/infrastructure'))
  EOF
  
  basic_profile = "ALLOW"
}

# Git ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆé…ä¿¡ç”¨
resource "google_network_security_gateway_security_policy_rule" "allow_git_objects" {
  name                    = "allow-git-objects"
  location               = var.region
  gateway_security_policy = google_network_security_gateway_security_policy.main.name
  priority               = 102
  enabled                = true
  
  session_matcher = 'host() == "objects.githubusercontent.com"'
  basic_profile   = "ALLOW"
}

# è©³ç´°ãªãƒ­ã‚®ãƒ³ã‚°è¨­å®š
resource "google_logging_log_sink" "proxy_logs" {
  name        = "${var.prefix}-proxy-logs"
  destination = "bigquery.googleapis.com/projects/${var.project_id}/datasets/security_logs"
  
  filter = <<-EOF
    resource.type="gce_network"
    AND protoPayload.serviceName="networksecurity.googleapis.com"
    AND protoPayload.methodName="google.cloud.networksecurity.v1.NetworkSecurity.EvaluatePolicy"
  EOF

  bigquery_options {
    use_partitioned_tables = true
  }
}
